definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4

sentences.english: Many foreigners now go to Hanshan Temple to celebrate Chinese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 现在有许多外国人也去寒山寺庆祝春节。

sentences.english: Spring festival is over, nothing special happened. I am just sleeping, eating then eating, sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 春节假期过去了，没什么特别，只不过是吃吃睡睡。

sentences.english: Spring Festival period, each and every family must manufacture dozens of catty glutinous rice glutinous rice cakes.
sentences.chinese: 春节期间，家家户户都要制作数十斤的糯米糍粑。

sentences.english: So far, Ciba is still the South before the Spring Festival every year people around the food must be done.
sentences.chinese: 至今，糍粑仍是南方各地人民每年春节前必做的美食。

sentences.english: During the Spring Festival, many families prefer New Year pictures.
sentences.chinese: 在春节期间，许多家庭都喜欢年画。

sentences.english: The holiday officially lasts six days, but many workers take a month off.
sentences.chinese: 法定春节假期为6天，但是很多农民工会放假一个月。

sentences.english: Open house of DAP Teratai Community Centre.
sentences.chinese: 莲花苑社区中心春节团拜。

sentences.english: Tetis a military disaster for the North Vietnamese.
sentences.chinese: 春节对于北越来说是军事上的败笔。

sentences.english: The 2015 Spring Festival marked the coming of digital red packets on WeChat.
sentences.chinese: 2015年春节时，微信迎来了数字红包。

sentences.english: What do people usually do at Sping Festival?
sentences.chinese: 人们通常在春节时做什么？

sentences.english: The spring festival in 2015 . The red packages are not traditional .
sentences.chinese: 2015年春节红包与往常相比变得不太一样了。

sentences.english: Serving desserts brings a sweet life in the new year.
sentences.chinese: 春节期间吃甜食，寓意新年甜甜蜜蜜。

sentences.english: What will you do on Spring Holidays break this year?
sentences.chinese: 今年春节长假你要做什么？

sentences.english: What do you intend to sent to your pen-friend this Spring Festival?
sentences.chinese: 今年春节你打算给你的笔友寄点什么？

sentences.english: Peoplepig, busily preparing for the Spring Festival after eating and drinking.
sentences.chinese: 人们杀猪宰羊，忙碌地准备着春节大吃大喝一番。

sentences.english: Mid- Autumn Festival and Spring Festival are special festivals in China.
sentences.chinese: 中秋节和春节是中国特别的节日。

definition: to celebrate the Chinese New Year
Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar
last day of the lunar year/Chinese New Year's Eve
to visit one's friends and relatives
the Mid-Autumn Festival on 15th of 8th lunar month
the beginning of Spring/the 10 or 20 days following the lunar New Year's Day
